content.description:
Quia videor1 acer, alligantalligo, -are: to tie up me interdiuinterdiu, adv.: during the day,
luce ut quiescam et uigilemvigilo, -are: to be awake nox cum uenerit.
 1:The subject of videor is a dog.↩
content.question: In the passage, what does quia mean?

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
